Summary: Flashing White, Red & Green Light in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn our house feeding the baby. Heard report on the RCMP scanner discribing the location of it. I had seen it for a few minutes befor but had thought that it was a star. Have no idea. It was over the old gondola ruins on Mount Hays. Moving very slowly to the SW. It must hav been some great distance away. Called a friend who lived on the otherside of the mountain, he could not see it. Then called my brother who lives just over a mile to the south of us, he could see it. I had left the baby in her crib and she got very unhappy so I went to comfort her, and it was gone when I got back. I took about a minute of vidio pictures of it but the autofocus seemed to keep losing focus and there seem to be very poor color to them.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Prince Rupert
There were no other sightings in Prince Rupert on or around March 25th 2006
